title: Mini-Ep 79: Down in the Dumps
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 79: Down in the Dumps
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate hear from several listeners regarding the use of the abbreviation “thx”, lend advice to a listener wondering how to organize their space whilst living with roommates, and receive a voicemail from someone who was dumped via PDF.To leav...
description:
Doree and Kate hear from several listeners regarding the use of the abbreviation “thx”, lend advice to a listener wondering how to organize their space whilst living with roommates, and receive a voicemail from someone who was dumped via PDF.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Fabletics - Visit Fabletics.com/forever35 to get 2 leggings for only $24.
  • The Testaments (CA) - You can purchase The Testaments from your favorite audiobook retailer or visit penguinrandomhouse.ca.
  • Bombas - Save 20% off your first purchase when you go to bombas.com/forever35.
  • StitchFix - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 for an extra 25% off when you keep all Items in your box.
  • LOLA - For 30% off your first month’s subscription, visit mylola.com and use promo code FOREVER2019.
  • Casper - Get $100 toward select mattresses by visiting casper.com/forever35 and using promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
